CustomField.formula: IF(BNR_Application_Status_Code__c <> null, CASE( BNR_Application_Status_Code__c, "AM" , "Admitted (Final)", "AC" , "Accepted", "AU" , "Accepted", "DE" , "Denied", "IN" , "Inactive", "AP" , "Applicant", "AA" , "Academically Admitted(I20)", "WD" , "Withdrawal", "Error - Unknown Code"), "")
CustomField.label: Application Status Display
